alert.note: Alert for Pryor, Northern Bighorn Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued October 11 at 2:37PM MDT until October 13 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Periods of heavy snow. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 2 feet, greatest on north facing slopes above 8000 feet. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph and create areas of blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...In Montana, Pryor/Northern Bighorn Mountains. In Wyoming, Northeast Bighorn Mountains. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 6 AM MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult on US-14 through Burgess Junction. Expect areas of blowing snow and reduced visibility. Recreation in the high country will be impacted by wintry conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest snow will occur tonight through Thursday afternoon.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.
